full_summary:
**GRASS CUTTING GROUNDS MAINTENANCE**
================================================'''

* **Reference Number**: WS3943239511-Doc3978071945
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3943239511
* **Publication Date**: April 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 12, 2023, 14:00 (ET)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 17, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

**Tender Details**
-------------------

This tender is a Request for Proposal under the Government of Canada's Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and is open to all eligible bidders.

**Description**
---------------

The project involves the maintenance of grass cutting and grounds at various locations across Ontario.

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria**
-----------------------------------------

Bidders must submit a comprehensive bid package, which will be evaluated based on two main criteria: Technical Merit and Price.

**Instructions to Tenderers**
-----------------------------

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted electronically via [Canadian Government Procurement](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16071668).
* Bids must be submitted by May 12, 2023, at 14:00 (ET). Late bids will be deemed non-responsive.
* Bidders are responsible for ensuring they have met the evaluation criteria and submission requirements.

**Contracting Entity**
----------------------

The contracting entity for this project is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), represented by the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Points of Contact**
-----------------------

For any questions or clarifications related to this tender, please contact Jessica Canas (SPAC/PSPC) at [jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
